white: Staying with Monika in the space classroom forever.
Using a noose as a neckwarmer.
Yuri's back pain that is TOTALLY caused by her reading posture.
Protag making everything worse than they already are, as usual.
Engaging in blood play with Yuri.
Justifying the equivalent of murder because "They weren't real".
Theorizing about DDLC's sequel even though Dan Salvato has made it clear that their next project doesn't involve DDLC.
Sayori's death scene except she's dabbing.
The Dark Soul of Visual Novels.
All the girls in the Literature Club getting uncomfortably close to you.
Uploading their consciousness onto the digital realm just so they could be with Monika forever.
Yuri's bloodshot eyes staring deep into your soul.
Asking Natsuki's dad for his approval.
The fact that Monika knows when you look up lewds of her.
Snapping her neck 90 degrees to the left.
Exposing innocent minds to a horrific reality.
Cute anime girls with depressing backstories.
The biggest pen you've ever seen in your entire life.

Arguments about which Doki is best Doki.
Doki Doki Literature Club: The Musical.

The same rope that Sayori used to kill herself.

A malnourished girl with daddy issues.

Looking for coins under the vending machine.
Deleting everyone else so I can be with you.

Not being there for her when she needs it the most.
All good times coming to an end.

Dead bodies of Yuri's previous lovers.

Visiting your friend with crippling depression.
